cdrom with fake and real books

2004-02-23

I didn't just get an unmarked package in the post from a mysterious stranger, its only contents a cd-rom with twelve jazz fake books, including

Bill Evans Fakebook,
The Colorado Cookbook,
The Jazz Fakebook,
Jazz LTD,
The Real Book Volume I,
The Real Book Volume II,
The Real Book Volume III,
The New Real Book I,
The New Real Book II,
The New Real Book III,
Library Of Musician's Jazz,
and The Book,

but if I did I sure would be excited about it.
